item.title: Jolly Trolley Casino: A Wild Ride Through Vintage Las Vegas History
item.description:
A Trolley Full of Trouble: Introducing Jolly Trolley Casino

The Las Vegas Strip has seen its share of themed casinos, but few were as distinctive – and as… memorable – as the Jolly Trolley Casino. Located at 2440 Las Vegas Boulevard South, directly across from the Sahara, it burst onto the scene in 1977, replacing Honest John’s and the Centerfold Casino. What made it stand out? Everything, really. From its vibrant, trolley-car shaped marquee to its unapologetically adult-themed atmosphere, Jolly Trolley was a concentrated dose of 1970s Vegas weirdness.
